alert.note: Alert for Chester; Union (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 1:41PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CHESTER AND SOUTHEASTERN UNION COUNTIES THROUGH 215 PM EDT... At 141 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles southeast of Union, or over Carlisle, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chester, Carlisle, Lowrys, Chester State Park, Richburg, Leeds, Cornwell, Tuckertown, and Santuc. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
